text: 15:36 Isei 69:21Makhoigi maraktagi amana chenkhiduna sponge15:36 Achouba ipakta leiba thawai panba potsak amadagi oirakpa ising chupsinba potsak ama. ama asinba yuda luptuna chei amagi matonda lengsillaga madu thaknanaba Ibungogi chinbalda thamladuna hairak-i, “Ngaikho! Mangonda kari amata touganu, mahakpu cross-tagi louthanaba Elijah lakpra haibadu eikhoi yengkhisi.”
